features: üåøCOTTON HAIR TIES - 6 x biodegradable black elastic hair bands made of 100% organic cotton and natural plant-based rubber. With no plastics and no metal, these hair ties are completely biodegradable and create zero waste. Perfect for every hair type, whether you have straight or curly hair, long or short hair, thick or thin hair, these ties are ideal for everyone. These work as a men‚Äôs hair band, too!

üåøECO HAIR TIES - These no snag hair bands contain no metal so they do not pull on the hair, reducing breakage and split ends. The stretchy elastic holds tight for daily use as well as for heavy sports use, the soft cotton leaves no dents or deformations on the hair.

üåøCOMPLETELY BIODEGRADABLE - It takes 500 years for a hair tie to decompose, instead choose these hair ties created from eco-friendly material cotton and natural rubber. Once you are finished with your hair tie it will completely biodegrade.

üåø TRUSTED BRAND ‚Äì Wild & Stone‚Äôs mission is to create stylish, easy to adopt and usable alternatives to common plastic products around the home. We source all our products sustainably, from raw material to final delivery. We pride ourselves on our customer service and have over 200,000 happy customers
üåø RECYCLABLE PACKAGING ‚Äì all our packaging is plastic free recyclable kraft packaging using toxin-free vegetable dyes. We do not believe in using excess packaging.
description: Product Description Easy to adopt, usable and stylish alternatives to single use plastic At Wild & Stone, we promise to do our best to provide you with products that you'll love. Our products are always: Sustainable - All our products are sourced and created consciously, creating minimal social and environmental impact on their journey from raw materials to consumers. Fairly Priced - Our products have prices that reflect responsible sourcing and the use of high-quality materials. We strive to give you the best product possible. Beautifully Designed - We put time and care into creating beautiful products that will compliment your lifestyle and your home. Our products are bespoke and have been adapted over time based on testing and customer feedback. Customer Focused - We have over 200,000 happy customers and offer a 30 day happiness promise. We'll rectify any problems as soon as possible. Giving Back - We proudly support the Marine Conservation Society. We donate a percentage of every sale to help ensure our seas are healthy, pollution free and protected. Great For Every Hair Type The organic cotton is strong enough for thick hair but soft enough not to cause headaches. They are perfect for every hair type, whether you have straight or curly hair, long or short hair, thick or thin hair; these ties are ideal for everyone; they are the only hair elastics you‚Äôll ever need! Protect Your Locks The stretchy elastic holds tight for daily use and heavy sports use; the soft cotton leaves no dents or deformations on the hair, designed with no metal to reduce pull on the hair, decreasing breakage and split ends. Colours For Everyone These hair ties come in a variety of colours for everyone. Our black pack is for those who want to keep it simple, the naturals are perfect to match your hair colour, and the multicolour pack are for when you‚Äôre looking to stand out, or perhaps you‚Äôd like to just mix-and-match with your outfits. The Replacement For Plastic Hair Ties Our hair ties are the perfect replacement for other plastic varieties. They are made from 100% organic cotton and plant-based rubber and come in a pack of 6. With no plastics and no metal, these hair ties create zero waste. It takes 500 years for a normal hair tie to decompose, when you are finished with your Wild & Stone hair tie it won‚Äôt harm our planet. Help Us Make A Change Today, more than 5 trillion pieces of plastic are floating in our oceans. It is predicated that by 2050 there will be more plastic in our oceans than fish. Certifications Conscious Packaging Packaging made from kraft paper and printed using vegetable dyes. Ethically Made Our factory is based in the South Indian coastal state of Tamil Nadu. Fair Working Conditions Our team operate under safe working conditions (SEDEX) and are free to join unions. Conscious Shipping We use sea shipments for all of our products.
